comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Maria Gay (1879-1943), Catalan opera singer; and Giovanni Zenatello, an Italian tenor. They were considered husband and wife and lived as such, but the legal status of their partnership may not have been so clearcut. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maria_Gay en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giovanni_Zenatello

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for the details about opera singers Maria Gay and Giovanni Zenatello.  We will add their fuller names and dates to the description when we update.
